Articles.Content:
Yes that's right - no Kerbin, but vintage Earth.

Be warned though, because:

1) I am still getting used to RSS

2) Kerbals will die (Great variety - Oxygen deprivation, crashes, bad designs)

3) I cannot guarantee clean language at all times (I sometimes get angry, though it happens rather rare when playing KSP)

4) The music I play while playing KSP may not be everybodys taste (unless you like Mass Effect, in that case, come all in)

5) I am fairly new to streaming.

Other than that, feel free to hang in and have a look at a RSS newbie doing some practical research with rocket designs.

I stream when i'm in the mood, so no exact calendars, times, etc., gonna do it for like an hour each day.

www.twitch.tv/darthalexius

-CBN
